remarks: This theorem proves Lemma 2 in [BrosowskiDeutsh] p. 92 when A is empty, the trivial case.  Here D is used to denote the set A of Lemma 2, because the variable A is used for the subalgebra.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 20-Apr-2017.)
